records.Subject: New Site Request for Sara Ali (1621D)
records.Description:
Create New Site for Sara Ali (1621D) OO Provision Test Site Location: PCP - for use with External Parties Site Title: Parsons Technology Capabilities Site Name: TechnologyCapabilities Alternate Contact for Site: Melissa Kletzker (07944) Site URL: https://parsons365.sharepoint.com/sites/TechnologyCapabilities For 

BU: FED Project End Date: 4/1/2025 Needs Project Information Management: Yes Project is in Region: US Site Description: Additional Requirements: Original request below: I’m working with Rico Lorenzo and Sara Ali on an upcoming Webinar Series featuring different technologies that Carey Smith asked Rico to do. The first webinar will be April 14. As part of that, Carey also asked them to create a new PWeb/SharePoint page where they can have supporting text and house the videos. We are wondering if you can create the shell of this for Sara, and provide her admin rights so she can then keep the site up to date. Rico has asked that the site be very “techy” looking (perhaps similar in look and feel to the Products page?). They are looking for the following structure: Business Groups > Far Right tab under Products > add new tab called “Technologies” On that landing page, we’d like to feature “Technologies” and have sharp-looking “icons” for each of the following topics (with the ability to add more). Clicking on each icon would take you to another page with a brief overview and the video link. • Data Analytics & AI/ML • Cyber • Cloud • Advanced Sensing • Rapid prototyping Then we’d also like a separate section called “Meet Our Leaders” which would lead to a page with headshots, names, and responsibilities. 

Submitter: Sara Ali (1621D) 

Justification: Site will be used to showcase Parsons technology capabilities.

Site Description:   Parsons will perform remedial construction and oversight over approximately 12 months starting in October 2023. Work will include initial submittal review; mobilization; excavation, stabilization and off-site disposal of PCB and lead impacted lagoon soils; in-situ solidification of subsurface lagoon soils; excavation and stabilization of shallow surface soils and tributary sediments; placement of treated soils and sediment within the lagoon; installation of a paved cover system; and restoration of upland and tributary work areas.

Justification:	Parsons is overseeing and managing construction work for the C&D Power Systems project as part of the NYSDEC program.
